name: Player1 Odyssey
description:
The first truly hardcore mobile experience. face new gameplays each 20 seconds!

Play our demo, we now have 8 levels with 5 different gameplays, 9 diaries to unlock, and the story incipit!

if you like the game help us by making a donation through this link 

https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=MU72YNBYFBQ...

our primary goal is to release the final build, our dream is to port Player1 Odyssey on Nintendo Switch
